title: How do I stop Pixel reading out WhatsApp messages?
content: When I have my headphones in and listening to music and I get a new WhatsApp message it will read it out "New message from ____" and if it's got an emoji in the name or group it reads out the description. SUPER ANNOYING. TalkBack isn't switched on so I'm not sure what or why it's happening.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
